page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN SKERRIES
page.content:
Today it is raining so my father can't work on the{roads,}as the rain ruins the tar. He will go and repair a {telephone}instead,as some channels are off. He has to go and read electricity meters for the{Hydro-Board}and try to find the cause of the power-cuts. He should go to the{lighthouse}and{Muckle {Skerry}today to check the equipment but the sea is too rough for the boat.
Every day{Donnie}goes to the water supply at the{dam.}He checks to see if the water is pure and then he pumps it into the big green reserve tank and from there into the taps of the whole isle. He works at the{salmon farm}and at the{lighthouse,}checking to see if the light is working. He takes out his small boat and sets{lobster}pots and he comes twice a week to teach{wood_ {work}in the school.
